definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: B: I used to bite my toenails when I was younger but now I don’t.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候常咬脚指甲，但现在不了。
手指甲比脚指甲长得快。

sentences.english: Why do elephants paint their toenail red?
sentences.chinese: 为什么大象把脚指甲染成红色？

sentences.english: Next time I have a nagging hang-nail, I'll just cut off my foot.
sentences.chinese: 下次我脚指甲长了，我就把脚给剁了。

sentences.english: A fingernail or toenail takes about 6 months to grow from base to tip.
sentences.chinese: 手指甲或脚指甲从根部长到指尖约需6个月。

sentences.english: Toenails are less important than fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 脚指甲并没有手指甲那么重要。

sentences.english: What should I do if I have very curved toenails?
sentences.chinese: 如果我的脚指甲长得非常弯，应该如何处理呢？

sentences.english: I can't cut this nail here because it hurts a lot when I try to cut it.
sentences.chinese: 我不能剪脚指甲，因为每次试图剪的时候会觉得很痛。

sentences.english: I used to bite my toenails when I was younger but now don't.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候常咬脚指甲，但现在不了。

sentences.english: The border of epidermal tissue surrounding a fingernail or toenail.
sentences.chinese: 甲周皮围绕手指甲或脚指甲的表面组织边缘。

sentences.english: I would also like a manicure and pedicure .
sentences.chinese: 我也想要修手和脚指甲。

definition: variant of 腳趾|脚趾[jiao3 zhi3]
